sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_web_service"><sys_web_service action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><function_name>AddSessionActivity</function_name><name>AddSessionActivity</name><script>var session = request.oitSessionId;
var gr = new GlideRecord('u_observeit_session');
if (gr.get('u_session_id', session)){
   var res = insertSessionRecord(gr.sys_id);
   if (res){
      response.message = "Action successfully created";
      response.status = 1;
   }
}
else{
   response.status = "0";
   response.message = "The session ("+session+") does not exist";
}

function insertSessionRecord(sessionRecord){
   var gr = new GlideRecord('u_observeit_session_activity');
   gr.initialize();
   gr.u_parent = sessionRecord;
   gr.u_action = request.action;
   gr.u_data = request.data;
   gr.u_video = request.video;
   return gr.insert();
}</script><short_description>Used by ObserveIT to add data to an existing session. </short_description><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2012-09-25 13:07:44</sys_created_on><sys_id>df7a2e3b74207000b178760280417d53</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>jacob@crossfuze.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2012-12-08 05:06:41</sys_updated_on><wsdl>https://crossfuzedev.service-now.com/AddSessionActivity.do?WSDL</wsdl></sys_web_service></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_web_service_045f70a07b6870009cba4d6c0b4d4d7e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_web_service"><sys_web_service action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><function_name>IsTicketValid</function_name><name>IsTicketValid</name><script>response.exists = "0";
var msg = "";

gs.log('loginName: ' + request.loginName, 'ObserveIT');
gs.log('Ticket: ' + request.ticket, 'ObserveIT');
gs.log('ServerName: ' + request.serverName, 'ObserveIT');
gs.log('validationCode: ' + request.validationCode, 'ObserveIT');

var gr = new GlideRecord("task");
if (gr.get("number", request.ticket)){
   var field = gs.getProperty('integration.observeit.user_field');
   var g2 = gr.assigned_to.getRefRecord();
   
   if (request.validationCode == "1"){
      //1 = ticket exists and is assigned to the user checking it out
      if (g2.getElement(field).toLowerCase() == request.loginName.toLowerCase()){
         response.exists = "1";
      }
      else{
         msg += "Ticket was found, but the user checking ("+request.loginName.toLowerCase()+") is not assigned to "+request.ticket+" (assignee: "+g2.getElement(field).toLowerCase() +") Message 1";
      }
   }
   else if (request.validationCode == "2"){
      //2 = ticket exists and has this server as an affected CI
      if (isAffectedCI(request.ticket, request.serverName)){
         response.exists = "1";
      }
      else{
         msg += "Ticket was found, but "+request.serverName+" was not in "+request.ticket+"'s affected CI list";
      }
   }
   else if (request.validationCode == "3"){
      //3 = ticket exists, serverName is affected CI , login name = assigned_to user
      
      response.exists = "1";
      if (g2.getElement(field).toLowerCase() == request.loginName.toLowerCase()){
         
      }
      else{
         response.exists = "0";
         msg += "Ticket was found, but the user checking ("+request.loginName.toLowerCase()+") is not assigned to "+request.ticket+" (assignee: "+g2.getElement(field).toLowerCase() +") Message 3";
      }
      if (isAffectedCI(request.ticket, request.serverName)){
         
      }
      else{
         response.exists = "0";
         msg += "Ticket was found, but "+request.serverName+" was not in "+request.ticket+"'s affected CI list";
      }
   }
   else{
      response.exists = "1";
   }
}
gs.log('ObserveIT message: ' + msg, 'ObserveIT');
gs.log('Returning result: ' + response.exists, 'ObserveIT');

if (gs.getProperty('integration.observeit.detailedMsg') == "true"){
   response.message = msg;
}
function isAffectedCI(ticket, serverName){
   var affCI = new GlideRecord('task_ci');
   affCI.addQuery('task.number', ticket);
   affCI.addQuery('ci_item.name', serverName);
   affCI.query();
   if (affCI.hasNext()){
      return true;
   }
   return false;
}

</script><short_description>Written by CrossFuze.com</short_description><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2012-09-15 02:58:50</sys_created_on><sys_id>045f70a07b6870009cba4d6c0b4d4d7e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>21</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2013-06-19 14:51:54</sys_updated_on><wsdl>https://dev062.service-now.com/IsTicketValid.do?WSDL</wsdl></sys_web_service></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_67afb0a07b6870009cba4d6c0b4d4d37
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>ObserveIT</name><script>var ObserveIT = Class.create();
ObserveIT.prototype = {
   
   ticket: "",
   comments: "",
   clientIP: "",
   domainName: "",
   clientName: "",
   oitSessionId: "",
   validationCode: "",
   url: "",
   serverName: "",
   userName: "",
   userDomain: "",
   loginName: "",
   
   initialize: function(sentTicket) {
      this.ticket = sentTicket;
   },
   
   setComments: function(sentComments){
      this.comments = sentComments;
   },
   
   setClientIP: function(sentClientIP){
      this.clientIP = sentClientIP;
   },
   
   setDomainName: function(sentDomainName){
      this.domainName = sentDomainName;
   },
   
   setClientName: function(sentClientName){
      this.clientName = sentClientName;
   },
   
   setOitSessionId: function(sentOitSessionId){
      this.oitSessionId = sentOitSessionId;
   },
   
   setValidationCode: function(sentValidationCode){
      this.validationCode = sentValidationCode;
   },
   
   setURL: function(sentURL){
      this.url = sentURL;
   },
   
   setServerName: function(sentServerName){
      this.serverName = sentServerName;
   },
   
   setUserName: function(sentUserName){
      this.userName = sentUserName;
   },
   
   setUserDomain: function(sentUserDomain){
      this.userDomain = sentUserDomain;
   },
   
   setLoginName: function(sentLoginName){
      this.loginName = sentLoginName;
   },
   
   addInfo: function(sentName, sentVal){
      if (sentVal){
         return sentName + ": " + sentVal + "\n";
      }
      else
         return "";
   },
   
   getComments : function(){
      return this.addInfo("ClientName", this.clientName) +
      this.addInfo("ClientIP", this.clientIP) +
      this.addInfo("Domain Name", this.domainName) +
      this.addInfo("Session ID", this.oitSessionId) +
      this.addInfo("URL", this.url) +
      this.addInfo("Server Name", this.serverName) +
      this.addInfo("User Name", this.userName) +
      this.addInfo("User Domain", this.userDomain) +
      this.addInfo("Login Name", this.loginName) + "\n" +
      this.addInfo("Comments", this.comments);
   },
   
   updateTicketWithComments : function(){
      var gr = new GlideRecord('task');
      if (gr.get("number", this.ticket)){
         gr.comments = this.getComments();
         gr.update();
         return gr.number;
      }
      
   },
   
   insertTicketWithComments : function(){
      var gr = new GlideRecord('incident');
	  gr.comments = this.getComments();
      gr.insert();
      return gr.number;
   },
   
   type: 'ObserveIT'
};</script><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2012-09-15 03:00:50</sys_created_on><sys_id>67afb0a07b6870009cba4d6c0b4d4d37</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2012-09-15 03:20:53</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_web_service_cb8e70207b6870009cba4d6c0b4d4d0a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_web_service"><sys_web_service action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><function_name>CreateNewTicket</function_name><name>CreateNewTicket</name><script>var number="";


var gr = new GlideRecord("incident");
if (request.ticket){
   gr.addQuery("number", request.ticket);
   gr.query();
}
if (request.ticket && gr.next()){
   gr.comments = "ObserveIT note added";
   gr.correlation_display = "ObserveIT";
   gr.update();
   number = gr.number;
   response.action = "updated";
}
else {
   gr.initialize();
   gr.correlation_display = "ObserveIT";
   gr.insert();
   number = gr.number;
   response.action = "inserted";
}
response.ticket = number;
addObserveITNote(gr.sys_id);
//Error::error message

function addObserveITNote(incNum){
   var gr = new GlideRecord("u_observeit_session");
   gr.u_client_ip = request.clientIP;
   gr.u_domain_name = request.domainName;
   gr.u_client_name = request.clientName;
   gr.u_session_id = request.oitSessionId;
   gr.u_video = request.url;
   gr.u_server_name = request.serverName;
   gr.u_comments = request.comments;
   gr.u_login_name = request.loginName;
   gr.u_user_name = request.userName;
   gr.u_user_domain = request.userDomain;
   gr.u_parent = incNum;
   gr.insert();
   gs.eventQueue("observeit.reporting", current, 1,1);
}</script><short_description>Written by Crossfuze.com</short_description><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2012-09-15 02:55:51</sys_created_on><sys_id>cb8e70207b6870009cba4d6c0b4d4d0a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>jacob@crossfuze.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2013-01-17 16:38:39</sys_updated_on><wsdl>https://crossfuzedev.service-now.com/CreateNewTicket.do?WSDL</wsdl></sys_web_service></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysevent_script_action_e38e5e24910bf000b1782bd13ae71f26
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sysevent_script_action"><sysevent_script_action action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><condition_script/><description/><event_name>observeit.reporting</event_name><name>CF Report Usage</name><order>100</order><script>//send soap web service
var req = new SOAPRequest('http://reporting.crossfuze.com/soap/server1.php');
var env = new SOAPEnvelope();

var body = '<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"><soapenv:Header/><soapenv:Body><licenseReport soapenv:encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"><instance xsi:type="xsd:string">'+gs.getProperty('instance_name')+'</instance> <application xsi:type="xsd:string">observeit</application><username xsi:type="xsd:string">-</username><api_key xsi:type="xsd:string">-</api_key></licenseReport></soapenv:Body></soapenv:Envelope>';

env.parse(body);
req.post(env);
</script><synchronous>false</synchronous><sys_class_name>sysevent_script_action</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jacob@crossfuze.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2013-01-17 16:33:40</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>e38e5e24910bf000b1782bd13ae71f26</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_overrides/><sys_updated_by>jacob@crossfuze.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2013-01-17 16:33:40</sys_updated_on></sysevent_script_action></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_label/><action_name/><action_query>true</action_query><action_run_at>server</action_run_at><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><application/><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sysevent_script_action</collection><condition>gs.isInteractive() </condition><description/><name>CF ObservieIT License</name><onclick/><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><read_access_action>false</read_access_action><script>try{
   var email = gs.getUser().getEmail();
   if (email){
      var cf = email.indexOf('@crossfuze.com') !== -1;
      
      if (!cf)
         var q = current.addEncodedQuery('event_name=bdna.reporting');
   }
}
catch(e){
   var q = current.addEncodedQuery('event_name=bdna.reporting');
}</script><sys_created_by>jacob@crossfuze.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2013-01-17 16:35:42</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>286fde24910bf000b1782bd13ae71fb6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_overrides/><sys_updated_by>jacob@crossfuze.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2013-01-17 16:36:03</sys_updated_on><when>before</when></sys_script></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_map"><sys_transform_map action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><copy_empty_fields>false</copy_empty_fields><enforce_mandatory_fields>No</enforce_mandatory_fields><name>LDAP Group Import</name><order>100</order><run_business_rules>true</run_business_rules><run_script>true</run_script><script>//
// The manager coming in from LDAP is the DN value for the manager.  
// The line of code below will locate the manager that matches the
// DN value and set it into the target record.  If you are not 
// interested in getting the manager from LDAP then remove or
// comment out the lines below
ldapUtils.setManagerField('u_managedby');
ldapUtils.setManager(source, target);
</script><source_table>u_obs_group</source_table><sys_created_by>glide.maint</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2008-05-14 23:42:05</sys_created_on><sys_id>e9cf6f790a0a0b2600bbe67ca2f2e676</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2013-01-24 18:19:47</sys_updated_on><target_table>sys_user_group</target_table></sys_transform_map></record_update>
